instructions: Select a Drummer region. Swipe the Follow switch right to turn it on. Tap the Follow Track pop-up menu that appears under Kick & Snare (Kick, Snare & Claps on electronic drum kits), then choose a track from the list.
Delete the selected Drummer region: Tap the Trash icon on the right side of the region. Create a new Drummer region: Tap an empty part of a Drummer track, then tap Create.
